revised_title: Exploring the Morbid Actions of the Straight Muscles and Cornea of the Eye
tldr: This article discusses the different actions of the straight muscles in the eye and their role in vision. It explains three diseases that arise from morbid actions of these muscles, including inability to see near objects, double vision, and squinting. The author also explores the treatment and causes of these diseases, emphasizing the importance of proper care and rest for the eyes.
